snippet: Mike Duggan delivered his first public address as the new mayor of Detroit on Tuesday, asking frustrated residents not to move out of the bankrupt city.
abstract: Mike Duggan delivers his first public address as new mayor of Detroit, asking frustrated residents not to move out of bankrupt city.
lead_paragraph: Mike Duggan delivered his first public address as the new mayor of Detroit on Tuesday, asking frustrated residents not to move out of the bankrupt city.

headline.main: Michigan: New Mayor Detroit Asks Detroit Residents To Stay
headline.print_headline: Michigan: New Mayor Detroit Asks Detroit Residents To Stay
